column1: As COVID deaths continue to hit new records Trump's failures to address this crisis continue to pile up.   https://t.co/u9h2y4PR7E https://t.co/7HFzZ97Tb3

Trump's incompetence ensuring this country has a widespread national strategy for dealing with COVID has cost American lives. This is essential to slowing the spread of COVID and getting this country back on track.   https://t.co/zZxDJWAsdp
Small businesses are the backbone of our economy and country. @JoeBiden will fight to protect the businesses who have lost so much during COVID.
It's unacceptable that President Trump excludes experts from critical conversations as coronavirus cases around the country continue to surge: https://t.co/g8pxqwCsVw
I’m proud to be defending science and facts at a critical point in our country’s fight against COVID-19. https://t.co/BGg1e3s7e5

President Trump's destructive rhetoric throughout the course of his COVID-19 response has wrongfully mislead the public and continued to show a lack of leadership this country needs during these challenging times. We can do better this November.  https://t.co/vM1Wxi5TiL
We must hold the Trump administration accountable for their ineffective response to coronavirus. https://t.co/Z4fLuEqeLc

Actions speak louder than words. Trump's inability to take precautions during COVID is not only irresponsible but continues to enforce his lack of accountability.    https://t.co/vaXp8uJIPG https://t.co/KA4tvIVJtU

Thanks to the IL High School Democrats for organizing a fantastic Youth Climate Summit this weekend. As the worldwide scientific community comes together to tackle the COVID crisis I hope it shows the world we can also come together to address the climate crisis. https://t.co/1XtrPVBP5b

Is it really surprising that the President who didn't pay contractors and bankrupted a casino is not meeting his self-made promises on the COVID crisis? Americans deserve better leadership than this failure of a President.  https://t.co/JHtngWiKG8
